content.rendered:
Marine engineer with 30+ years of experience in the maritime industry. Sergey experience includes Marine Casualty Investigations, Hull and Machinery damage surveys, various P&I surveys, salvage operations, Condition surveys, JH 2013, Warranty and Risk Assessment surveys, seaworthiness assessment, expert witness provision and project cargo surveys.

Contact

New York, NY | +1 732 646 0326

Discipline: Engineer
Specialism: Marine engineering – equipment failure investigations, Marine Casualty Investigations, Hull and Machinery damage surveys, various P&I surveys, salvage operations etc.
Expert Witness Expertise: Expert opinion

jetpack-related-posts.title: Marine Surveys
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar has a reputation for being the leading provider of Hull & Machinery damage surveys, P&I surveys, risk assessments, inspections and audits providing 24/7 worldwide emergency response.
